subject: Thank you for your recent refinance debt request, we are accepting your refinance loan request
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire THIS NIGHT):
$276,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this short form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!
http://zdqrtx.com/
